about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I am a frontend developer with experience creating intuitive, accessible, and visually appealing interfaces. I am passionate about turning ideas into digital experiences that connect with people, combining design, code, and best development practices. I have worked with modern technologies such as React, TypeScript, Zustand, and React Native, focusing on user experience, project architecture, and code quality. I also enjoy sharing knowledge, creating technical content, and collaborating with communities, which has brought me closer to the world of Developer Relations. I am looking for projects that challenge me, inspire me, and allow me to keep growing both professionally and personally.
